document_data.mainbody:
Taam was a small town found near the center of the Pearl Cities region of west Zakhara.
Located approximately  north of Gana along Al-Sabiya River, Taam was located at an ideal spot for caravans departing Gana north to Tajar along the western slopes of Al-Yabki Mountains. Taam was located along the fringes of the fertile river valley fed by Al-Sabiya River.
